seriesStmt.title: University of Virginia Library, Text collection

publicationStmt.idno: Print copy consulted: UVA Library call number AP2 .H3 v.139 pt. 2 1919

projectDesc.p: Prepared for the University of Virginia Library Electronic Text Center.

editorialDecl.p: All unambiguous end-of-line hyphens have been removed, and the trailing part of a word has been joined to the preceding line.
The images exist as archived TIFF images, one or more JPEG versions for general use, and thumbnail GIFs.
Some keywords in the header are a local Electronic Text Center scheme to aid in establishing analytical groupings.

change.item: Converted SGML to XML. Fixed tagging.

respStmt.name: Ethan Gruber, University of Virginia Library

change.item: Converted XML markup from TEI Lite to uva-dl-tei (TEI P4 with local customizations).

respStmt.name: Greg Murray, University of Virginia Library

change.item: Programmatically updated TEI header markup (but not header content) for minimal compliance with current QA requirements.

div1.head:
THE SECRET DOVE
BY ZONA GALE

lg.l: I KNOW where a dove sits brooding in the dark,
Nested in leaves, the quiet boughs among;
And when the midnight falls I lean to mark
Her home, where a great star is hung.
The star, it does not know the secret dove,
The dove that firefly planet may not see.
What lovelier things the night may fold from me —
The watching eye, the brooding heart, and love.
